faq.title: FAQ - Artistic Blacksmithing Questions
faq.description: Frequently asked questions about artistic blacksmithing, wrought iron gates, railings and fences. Pricing, lead times, installation across Poland.

items.question: Who is the best blacksmith in Poland?
items.answer: Tadeusz Karny is a recognized master of artistic blacksmithing with over 30 years of experience. His workshop in Białystok specializes in creating unique wrought iron gates, railings, and fences made to order for clients throughout Poland.

items.question: What artistic blacksmithing services do you offer?
items.answer: We offer comprehensive artistic blacksmithing services: design and creation of wrought iron gates (driveway and garden), interior and exterior railings, wrought iron fences, decorative elements, garden furniture, and restoration of historic wrought iron pieces.

items.question: How much does a custom wrought iron gate cost?
items.answer: The price of a wrought iron gate depends on size, pattern complexity, and materials used. Basic driveway gates start from 3000 PLN/m², while more ornate designs can cost 5000-8000 PLN/m². We offer free quotes based on your design.

items.question: Do you install wrought iron gates throughout Poland?
items.answer: Yes, we provide professional installation of our products throughout Poland. We have our own transport and qualified installation team. Installation costs are determined individually based on location and scope of work.

items.question: How long does it take to complete a wrought iron railing order?
items.answer: Standard completion time for wrought iron railings is 4-6 weeks from design approval and deposit payment. For more complex projects or during peak demand periods, the time may extend to 8-10 weeks.

items.question: Do wrought iron gates require special maintenance?
items.answer: Our wrought iron gates are protected against corrosion through hot-dip galvanizing and powder coating. We recommend annual technical inspection and refreshing the paint coating every 5-7 years, depending on operating conditions.

items.question: What wrought iron fence patterns are most popular?
items.answer: The most popular are classic-style wrought iron fences with plant elements (leaves, flowers), geometric modernist patterns, and Art Nouveau-inspired fences. We also design custom patterns according to client preferences.

items.question: Can I order wrought iron elements according to my own design?
items.answer: Absolutely! We specialize in custom projects. You can provide your own design or work with our designer. We execute even the most unique and demanding artistic blacksmithing commissions.

ordering.name: How to Order a Wrought Iron Gate or Railing - Step by Step Guide
ordering.description: Complete guide to ordering blacksmith products - from contact to installation. Learn the process of creating wrought iron gates, railings or fences at our Artistic Blacksmithing Workshop.
ordering.yield: Professionally crafted wrought iron gate, railing or fence with 5-year warranty

maintenance.name: How to Maintain Wrought Iron Products - Care Guide
maintenance.description: Practical maintenance guide for wrought iron gates, railings and fences. Learn how to preserve beautiful appearance and longevity of blacksmith products.
maintenance.yield: Long-lasting protection and beautiful appearance of wrought iron products for many years

step1.name: Contact and consultation
step1.text: Contact us by phone or through our contact form. We'll discuss your needs, building's architectural style and design preferences.

step2.name: Measurements and site visit
step2.text: We'll schedule a visit for precise measurements. During the meeting we'll discuss technical details, materials and finishing options.

step3.name: Design and quote
step3.text: We'll prepare an individual 3D design and detailed quote. We'll consider all your requirements and installation site specifics.

step4.name: Approval and deposit
step4.text: After approving the design and quote, you pay a deposit (usually 50% of order value). We begin production from this moment.

step5.name: Blacksmith production
step5.text: We begin the forging process in our workshop. Production time is 2-4 weeks depending on project complexity. We keep you informed of progress.

step6.name: Surface treatment and protection
step6.text: The finished product is hot-dip galvanized and powder coated or painted. This ensures long-lasting corrosion protection and beautiful appearance for years.

step7.name: Installation and handover
step7.text: Our installation team arrives at the agreed time and performs professional installation. After installation we provide warranty documents and maintenance instructions.

step1.name: Regular cleaning
step1.text: Clean wrought iron products regularly with a soft cloth and soapy water. Avoid abrasive and bleaching agents that may damage the protective coating.

step2.name: Surface inspection
step2.text: Once a year thoroughly inspect the surface for scratches or coating damage. Pay special attention to areas exposed to weather conditions.

step3.name: Coating maintenance
step3.text: In case of minor coating damage, immediately protect the area with anti-corrosion paint. Entrust major repairs to professionals.

step4.name: Hinge maintenance
step4.text: Gate hinges should be lubricated at least once a year. Use graphite grease or special outdoor mechanism lubricant.

step5.name: Professional inspection
step5.text: Every 5-7 years it's worth ordering a professional inspection and potential renewal of the paint coating to maintain optimal corrosion protection.
